review: Fire stick is easy to set up and works perfectly every time.  Makes it so easy to watch a move.
author: Elise B

review: This little stick is amazing. Love the Prime videos and movies. We ate watching that way more then netflix. I can't get ot to work in my son's room yet roku did work in his room.  Not sure if it didn't have the same range or if I am something wrong.

review: I have to load it several times....it's hard to get "Girls" or "Hung" or "Bill Maher" and watch some of the programs I want to watch.  The remote just doesn't work all that well.  I need help with working it...I need to look up a Help Desk number I can call.
